Uses of Interface
com.guardtime.envelope.extending.ExtendingPolicy

  • Packages that use ExtendingPolicy 
    Package Description
    com.guardtime.envelope.extending
    General interfaces and classes to perform signature extending
    com.guardtime.envelope.extending.ksi
    Extending implementation for the KSI signatures
    com.guardtime.envelope.signature
    General classes and interfaces for all possible signature implementations
    com.guardtime.envelope.signature.ksi
    Implementation of the KSI signature
    com.guardtime.envelope.signature.postponed
    Implementation of the delegated signature, to allow postponing of the actual signing

    • Uses of ExtendingPolicy in com.guardtime.envelope.extending.ksi

      Classes in com.guardtime.envelope.extending.ksi that implement ExtendingPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KsiEnvelopeSignatureExtendingPolicy
      Extends all KSISignatures in Envelope to the "closest" publication in publication file available to provided Extender.
      class  PublicationKsiEnvelopeSignatureExtendingPolicy
      Extends all KSISignatures in Envelope to specified publication record.

    • Uses of ExtendingPolicy in com.guardtime.envelope.signature

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SignatureFactory.extend(EnvelopeSignature envelopeSignature, ExtendingPolicy extender)
      Updates the EnvelopeSignature to extend its underlying signature to a trust anchor.
